eventName: Adventure That Cannot Wait for the Sun
storyName: Take Me Out to the Grand Bazaar
storyInfo: At the Harvest Gathering, Pepe realizes that the second-place prize is the gem she is looking for and comes up with a plan to win it. Aspasia recognizes the third-place prize as the other goblet that belonged to her family.

attributes.content: Shh, stay in the grass and don't come out. I had to be real careful to get you out during the day.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: The grass is too short. It can't hide my ears.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: Then get lower!
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Uh...
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: Father, that girl is rummaging in the grass.
attributes.name: Curious Girl

attributes.content: Shh, it's not polite to point. She must be drunk.
attributes.name: Elegant Man

attributes.content: No! I can still see them!
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: She's about to fall into the grass. Should we help?
attributes.name: Curious Girl

attributes.content: Shh, pretend not to see her. A little fall never hurt anyone. It's being seen falling that's really embarrassing.
attributes.name: Elegant Man

attributes.content: This is where the events leading up to the Flood Festival are held, and all the competitors are here today to sign up. It would be very awkward to run into her during the competition.
attributes.name: Elegant Man

attributes.content: It's a Menat-Ha'mait tradition to sink various items into the river as a sacrifice to the river god ahead of the Flood Festival, praying for good luck.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Guess where we can find the rarest gems in the city.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: In the river.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: Wait here while I go get one of the bush trimming carts. You can sit in the bin for collecting fallen leaves.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: That way, we can get you to the river without anyone finding out!
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Are you sure this is a good idea?
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: Come on, stop tugging at my shirt and act your age!
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Stay hidden and stay put! I'll be back soon!
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Meow... meooow...
attributes.name: Mio

attributes.content: A... creature?
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: (Lifts tail elegantly)
attributes.name: Mio

attributes.content: Ah, many statues here were carved in your likeness.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: (Wags tail proudly)
attributes.name: Mio

attributes.content: Beautiful. No wonder the people here love you so much.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: (Holds up backside with dignity)
attributes.name: Mio

attributes.content: Do you want me to pet you? But you're too far, and Pepe told me not to move from here.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: (Makes a deliberate display)
attributes.name: Mio

attributes.content: Can you come closer?
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: (Shakes tail irritably)
attributes.name: Mio

attributes.content: Please don't be angry. Perhaps I can move forward a little.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: Meow...
attributes.name: Mio

attributes.content: Meow!
attributes.name: Mio

attributes.content: Wait!
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: Hey, Zubayr, stop gawking at cloudbeasts. Look what I've found!
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: ...Why do you look so dour?
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: I am not dour.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: Then get in here. I've measured it, it should fit you with room to spare.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: It's a little dirty...
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: Dirty? Just some fallen leaves and a piece of scrap paper. You were dug out of a hole filled with sand and dirt!
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: ...I respectfully decline.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: Alright, alright, I'll clean it. Fallen leaves... scrap paper... it's a leaflet. It's not even that dirty.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Pepe spreads open the rolled-up ball of paper.
She freezes on the spot.
Harvest Gathering? What is that?
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: Part of the local festivities... competitors display their most valued possessions, and the winners get prizes from the sponsors.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Many of the prizes are familiar. The second-place prize, in particular, brings back memories.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: Of course it does, Zubayr.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Do I still have to go into the bin?
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: Of course. I cleaned it for you.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Mmh...
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: (Mumbles in sleep)
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: This way... the mummy won't...
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: ...Whoa!
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Is she finally awake?
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: â€”Damn. I'm glad that was just a dream.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: I don't want to be haunted by the dead this young.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Please don't throw the vessel. Even if it is your own, you may not harm others while using it.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: Sorry. I thought it was my knife I was throwing.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Apology accepted. Good morning.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: Wait, morning?
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: In the silence, Narantuya sizes up the stranger before her, who gives off the aura of a seasoned warrior.
She slowly moves her hand to her belt, while carefully taking in her surroundings.
Her coin purse is still tied to her belt, but her weapons are gone.
Her knives are lying on the tea table, on the other side of this unfamiliar room.
The room itself seems unremarkable, but this is a city where even the manhole covers are laid with gems.
Narantuya knows that even the most unremarkable thing here can command a remarkable price.
Oh... it was you who saved my life?
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Thank you so much, kind soul! Once I get out of here, I'll have all my subordinates remember your name!
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: So...
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: How much do you want?
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: I'm sorry?
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: If you mean the bread and fruit that I brought back from my morning jog, these were gift from others that should not be valued in terms of money.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: I wasn't asking about that, or why I don't get good stuff like that when I walk the streets.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: â€”Wait, you mean it's free?
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Good. The sun is my witness, no taking back your word.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: I appreciate the kindness.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: How are you feeling?
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: Based on my medical knowledge, I do not believe you're injured, but you had been unconscious for a long time...
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: Oh, I'd forgotten to sleep for a while. Guess I was making up for it.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: No worries. Consider it a... bad hereditary habit.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Hereditary?
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: As long as it's nothing serious. Feeling unwell anywhere?
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: She reaches for her neck instinctively.
The needle wound has healed, but the memories from before the long nightmare begin to float to the surface.
The pass that never arrived, the failed kidnapping, the terrifying mummy, the feeling of freefall, the faint sound of wind.
That was the tenth floor... I didn't think I would ever wake up from that.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Wow, is that what dying feels like? It's terrible! Thank you for saving my life.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: They say that one can never truly die, if her name continues to be spoken after her death.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: But if eternal life means an eternal nightmare of being chased by mummies to the ends of the sands... then I must reconsider whether it's worth it to have my name known all across Sargon.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: You jumped from the window because you wanted to have your name known all across Sargon?
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: Hm? I suppose.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: I fail to understand the Sargonian obsession with such tradition... I sympathize. Had things not been going well for you in life?
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: Racked up a debt. It's been a pretty big headache.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Say, I want to ask you...
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: You saved my life, and I ought to repay you.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Do you want to work for me? I'm planning something of a great endeavor.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: I remember now. I made a wish when I fell from the building.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: I guess you're that 'competent subordinate' granted by fate.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Very well. I'm happy to be of help, if it alleviates your stress and gives you the will to live.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: Anat! Anat! Look what I found!
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: I don't know what you found, but I found that you've been sneaking away with the museum's collection again.
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: And putting him in a dirty... leaf bin.
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: Sorry, I just couldn't bear to watch him waste away in the museum, so I took him out to get some fresh air.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Is that so?
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: Er... yes, Anat Hanim, I was interested in seeing the outside.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: See? Let's drop this and talk about the good stuff I found.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Hm... a creased leaflet?
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: Look what it says!
attributes.name: Pepe
Anat
attributes.content: The typical pre-festival events.

attributes.name: Anat
attributes.content: Wait, is that...?
The third gem that Zubayr and I have been looking for!
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Didn't you say you took Zubayr out because he was wasting away in the museum?
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: Kill two fowlbeasts with one stone, as they say.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Did you think about how to get the gem? Second-place is not exactly easy to get.
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: The Harvest Gathering attracts the rich and noble, eager to show off their treasures. I know of at least two padishahs who are visiting anonymously.
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: I can help you appraise ancient artifacts, or volunteer myself as the entry...
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: No worries, that's the easy part.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: The hard part is finishing second.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: The entry has to be extraordinary, but not unique. It must represent an era, but not symbolize it.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: You need finish exactly second to get the 'large gem with unique characteristics and Shah-era markings'.
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: How to finish second...? That is the question.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Heheh.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Do you have an idea?
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: Pepe does not answer. She looks up at the skylight, squinting.
It is past noon, and sunlight spills through the round skylight, casting an oval of light on the ground.
Standing in the middle of the oval, Pepe grins from ear to ear, pointing at the sun outside.
Heknu, Horakhet.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Entering with a Horakhet statue? Not a bad choice.
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: No, I'm just expressing my gratitude for His inspiration. I'm not entering an item associated with Him.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Look at the circle He's casting on the ground. Doesn't it look like...?
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: I see. You plan to enter with a talisman engraved with a royal name. The cartouche is the symbol of good fortune and warding against evil. Perhaps that will catch the attention of the judges...
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: What are you people talking about?
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Isn't this oval of light just like a golden slipper?
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Slipper?
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: Yes. I'm winning that gem with a golden slipper that's been passed down through my family for generations!
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: I don't want to keep crouching behind this wall. Can I go in with you?
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: Stop complaining. I got you your ice cream. Can you actually taste it though?
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: No... I'm just curious what all those people were queuing for.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: Is your curiosity satisfied? Eat up, or your head is going to melt in the sun.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Ice treat created in my image... I'm surprised how popular I am here.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: Hm...
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: You may not be able to taste it, but you can feel the coolness, right?
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Not so much a sensation as an impulse...
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: An impulse to jump into the river, allow the water to flow over me, and have a good swim.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: That's just how we normally spend the summer, isn't it? Oh right... gold sinks in water.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: That's why I described it as an impulse.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: Alright, alright, be patient, and I'll take you to the largest artificial lake in town once the sun goes down and the competition has ended.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: I'll be going. See you later.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: (Pulls up cape)
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: â™ªThe papyrus reeds sway by the river, its waters of purest lazuriteâ™ª
attributes.name: Choir

attributes.content: â™ªIt wends its way by the golden dunes, fed by our gifts of gemsâ™ª
attributes.name: Choir

attributes.content: I knew you were here when I smelled synthesized courmarin.
attributes.name: Plainly-Dressed Woman

attributes.content: My watch tells me the competition doesn't start for another thirty minutes. I thought it was unfashionable in the new city to arrive on time.
attributes.name: Plainly-Dressed Woman

attributes.content: Twenty-seven minutes and fifty seconds, to be precise. My watch is more accurate.
attributes.name: Bejeweled Man

attributes.content: After all, its mechanism is based on the machine that the Shah of Past and Future invented after he discovered the artifact that gave mastery over time.
attributes.name: Bejeweled Man

attributes.content: Your idea of time is as vague as that sundial in the museum. You do not understand that the every grain of sand passing through the hourglass is a gold coin, when one arrives too early and has to wait.
attributes.name: Bejeweled Man

attributes.content: True, I believe this antique was last calibrated when the sundial was dug up. I wonder where your ancestors were, at the time.
attributes.name: Plainly-Dressed Woman

attributes.content: Perhaps I should inform them that it's actually 11:25, and both of them should adjust their watches.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: This sports watch is waterproof and dustproof, and has a compass on it. I wear it on my monthly climb of the Heria Mountains, and I can recommend it to them based on firsthand experience.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: Don't bother them. You got some free time, go try some other drinks.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: I like this iced guava juice more than the herbal tea.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: I'll get a few more cups if you want.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: I'm fine, I'm no padishah, I know how to use my hands.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: So... you're not contemplating suicide?
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Why would I, when you can get all sorts of free drinks just walking through a city garden like thisâ€”
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: If I may say so, my hundred-thousand dinar burdenbeast pulls the carriage faster. It could knock a grown man down with its wake.
attributes.name: Proud Woman

attributes.content: If I may say so, stability is the most important thing, and that's what the burdenbeasts of my ranch offer.
attributes.name: Composed Man

attributes.content: Oh!â€”Novsh! My cup!
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Unlike you, I don't have to pull down the curtains to stop sand sent flying by a carriage, or juice spilled by passersby.
attributes.name: Composed Man

attributes.content: What are these people doing here? This place is for drinks!
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Don't worry, I caught it. Not a single drop of guava juice was spilled.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: Let's find a place to sit by the roadside.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: (Mutters) She's the competent subordinate I've been wishing for alright... but am I even the boss, at this rate?
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: (Mutters) I should introduce her to Ajazi and Ajani.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Did you say something?
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: No, I was just thinking I would take a trip to the museum after I've tried all the drinks here.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: You're going there too?
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: Yeah, but I'm not as interested as you in the artifacts. I just lost something and I need to start searching from the last place I saw it.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Not a single beep from my communicator after all this time? Not one call?
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Unfortunately, the museum has remained closed ever since the incident, and I doubt the management would promptly contact the owners of lost items as promised.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: Whenever I close my eyes, I think back to the day when I glimpsed a fragment of the lost glory of ancient Minos, and the disarray within that grand museum.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: Setting everything aside, it is unbelievable that the staff could not recall the locations of the exhibit halls and the routes to them.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: Leading dozens of panicking tourists to the Northeast... to the Minoan exhibit, where there were no exits.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: I must strongly express my dissatisfaction when I have a chance to meet with museum management.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: Ha... I changed my mind. Let's not go to the museum today.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Excuse me. I see you're enjoying the drinks we have on offer today.
attributes.name: Gathering Staff

attributes.content: The two of you have lingered here for a while. Perhaps you are interested in participating in the Harvest Gathering?
attributes.name: Gathering Staff

attributes.content: You appear to be tourists. This pamphlet will give you details about this key event leading up to the Flood Festival.
attributes.name: Gathering Staff

attributes.content: Not interested.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Let's go, Aspasia... Aspasia?
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Fate has smiled on me at last.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: Narantuya, you say you have visited the museum. Perhaps you know what this is.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: No idea... isn't it just a simple old cup?
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: This is my family goblet!
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: The other goblet, to be precise.
attributes.name: Aspasia
